message: Let's split it 3:1, a fair start?
You got lucky last round, but I'm not giving you the upper hand this time!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't get too excited!
You're not getting any younger, Bob. Time to give me a better deal!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience. Meet me in the middle, but don't think you're getting the better end of the deal!
You're not getting any younger, Bob. I'm not getting any more desperate. Meet me at 60-40!
You're really trying to squeeze the last drops, aren't you? I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting a free lunch!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not getting any younger!
You're really running out of time, and I'm running out of patience. This is my best offer, take it or leave it!
This is my absolute final offer, Bob. Take it or walk away. I'm not negotiating further!
Fine, we'll go to the end. I'll meet you exactly in the middle. It's the best I can do.
